main.name: Akhona Stofile
main.description: I'm a web development engineer and I use react and python to develop pages...
main.bio: A junior Software developer with 1 year of experience in Spring framework, java, front-end and back-end application programming, Linux systems (SUSE enterprise and Ubuntu), developing and leveraging of databases using PostgreSQL and SQL. A personable, communicative, team oriented junior developer with knowledge of objectoriented programming languages. A 2020 software development graduate of Tshwane University of Technology.
main.contactmessage: Contact me using the details below:.

resume.skillmessage: My key skills obtained are as follows: Java Core, C++, Basic HTML5 and CSS, SQL and PL/SQL, React JS, Android Application Development, Spring Boot and Spring MVC, Docker and Kubernetes, Apache Tomcat, Jboss WildFly, Hibernate, JPA, JSP, Perform Code Reviews using Sonarqube
